mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PROMPT ( SOCIAL_ID, TYPE_CODE, GENRE_CODE, TIMEFRAME_CODE, THEME_CODE, EVENT, CHARACTERS, TELL_TYPE, CUSTOM, TITLE ) VALUES ( #{socialId}, #{typeCode}, #{genreCode}, #{timeframeCode}, #{themeCode}, #{event}, #{characters}, #{tellType}, #{custom}, #{title} )
INSERT INTO TBL_PROMPT_DETAIL ( GENRE, TIMEFRAME, THEME, PROMPT_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{genre}, #{timeframe}, #{theme}, #{promptSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT PR.PROMPT_SEQ AS PROMPT_SEQ, PR.TYPE_CODE AS TYPE_CODE, C_T.CODE_NAME AS TYPE, PR.GENRE_CODE AS GENRE_CODE, CASE WHEN PR.GENRE_CODE = 'G999' THEN PRD.GENRE ELSE C_G.CODE_NAME END AS GENRE, PR.TIMEFRAME_CODE AS TIMEFRAME_CODE, CASE WHEN PR.TIMEFRAME_CODE = 'F999' THEN PRD.TIMEFRAME ELSE C_F.CODE_NAME END AS TIMEFRAME, PR.THEME_CODE AS THEME_CODE, CASE WHEN PR.THEME_CODE = 'M999' THEN PRD.THEME ELSE C_M.CODE_NAME END AS THEME, PR.EVENT AS EVENT, PR.CHARACTERS AS CHARACTERS, PR.TELL_TYPE AS TELL_TYPE, PR.CUSTOM AS CUSTOM, PR.TITLE AS TITLE, PL.PLOT_SEQ AS PLOT_SEQ, PL.PLOT_CONTENT AS PLOT_CONTENT FROM TBL_PROMPT PR LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE C_T ON PR.TYPE_CODE = C_T.CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE C_G ON PR.GENRE_CODE = C_G.CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE C_F ON PR.TIMEFRAME_CODE = C_F.CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE C_M ON PR.THEME_CODE = C_M.CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_PROMPT_DETAIL PRD ON PR.PROMPT_SEQ = PRD.PROMPT_SEQ LEFT JOIN TBL_PLOT PL ON PR.PROMPT_SEQ = PL.PROMPT_SEQ WHERE PR.SOCIAL_ID = #{socialId}

SELECT PR.PROMPT_SEQ AS PROMPT_SEQ, PR.TYPE_CODE AS TYPE_CODE, C_T.CODE_NAME AS TYPE, PR.GENRE_CODE AS GENRE_CODE, CASE WHEN PR.GENRE_CODE = 'G999' THEN PRD.GENRE ELSE C_G.CODE_NAME END AS GENRE, PR.TIMEFRAME_CODE AS TIMEFRAME_CODE, CASE WHEN PR.TIMEFRAME_CODE = 'F999' THEN PRD.TIMEFRAME ELSE C_F.CODE_NAME END AS TIMEFRAME, PR.THEME_CODE AS THEME_CODE, CASE WHEN PR.THEME_CODE = 'M999' THEN PRD.THEME ELSE C_M.CODE_NAME END AS THEME, PR.EVENT AS EVENT, PR.CHARACTERS AS CHARACTERS, PR.TELL_TYPE AS TELL_TYPE, PR.CUSTOM AS CUSTOM, PR.TITLE AS TITLE, PL.PLOT_SEQ AS PLOT_SEQ, PL.PLOT_CONTENT AS PLOT_CONTENT FROM TBL_PROMPT PR LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE C_T ON PR.TYPE_CODE = C_T.CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE C_G ON PR.GENRE_CODE = C_G.CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE C_F ON PR.TIMEFRAME_CODE = C_F.CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE C_M ON PR.THEME_CODE = C_M.CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_PROMPT_DETAIL PRD ON PR.PROMPT_SEQ = PRD.PROMPT_SEQ LEFT JOIN TBL_PLOT PL ON PR.PROMPT_SEQ = PL.PROMPT_SEQ WHERE PR.PROMPT_SEQ = #{promptSeq}
